description: This restaurant run by an enthusiastic and friendly family (now joined by the fourth generation) has been serving traditional Piedmontese cuisine since 1919. The outdoor dining space is particularly charming when the wisteria is in bloom.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
